values: 贸易；买卖；交易；商业活动；商业；生意；行业；职业；手艺；技能；市场交易；商业往来；营业额
交易；做买卖；买卖；对换；进行商品（或服务的）交换；以物换物；从事贸易；从事商业往来；进行股票（或其他金融工具的）买卖

word_mean_info__list.difference: 口语用词，指买卖双方经过交涉达成协议成交。
普通用词，含义广。既可指某种具体的商业又可指广泛的贸易。
多指买卖双方通过谈判、协商就商品质量、数量、价格等项达成协议所成的生意。
多指大规模的买卖或易货关系。
指包括售货、购货、换货在内的综合商业活动，方式可以是批发或零售。
指任何种类的工作，也泛指职业。
较正式用词，语气庄重，指长期从事，但不一定以此为主计的职业。
泛指任何一种职业，既不分什么行业，也不管是脑力还是体力劳动。
指受雇于他人，领取工资以谋生计，有较固定工作的职业。
指需要有熟练技巧、技能和体力的职业。
以前常指要受过高等教育(尤指法律、医学和神学)才能获得的职业，现在一般指为谋生日的职业，尤指从事脑力劳动和受过专门训练，具有某种专业知识的职业。
指经过专门训练，终身愿意从事的职业。
通常指一切有收入，不分脑力与体力运动，不论是否有技艺的长期或临时的职业。

word_group.brief_definition: 用（旧物）贴换新物；出售；经营
工会分子, 工会会员；拥护工会制的人
贸易出版物；贸易刊物；贸易杂志
合法贸易；公平贸易；互惠贸易

bilingual.source: English spread through trade and the media.
bilingual.target: 英语通过贸易和媒体传播。

bilingual.source: English became the language of world trade.
bilingual.target: 英语成为了世界贸易的语言。

bilingual.source: The reason why English is spoken everywhere is that in the nineteenth century, English became the language of world trade.
bilingual.target: 各地都说英语的原因是，在19世纪，英语成为了世界贸易用语。
双边贸易可以减少贸易壁垒。
多边贸易可以减少贸易壁垒。

bilingual.source: The World Trade Organization has promoted global trade.
bilingual.target: 世界贸易组织促进了全球贸易的发展。

bilingual.source: Many countries resolve trade disputes through the World Trade Organization.
bilingual.target: 许多国家通过世界贸易组织解决贸易争端。
他们在市场上进行贸易。

bilingual.source: The trademanager attended the trade fair to explore new opportunities.
bilingual.target: 贸易经理参加了贸易展览会以探索新机会。
他们正在讨论一项贸易条约。

list.abstract: trade（英[treɪd]，美[treɪd]），英语单词。可做名词或动词用。做名词时，指贸易、交易、生意等；做动词时，指买卖货物、做生意、从事服务贸易。英语短语有international trade（国际贸易），例句：It's the London Tea Trade center.（这里是伦敦茶叶贸易中心。） 复数为trades，第三人称单数为trades，现在分词为trading，过去式为traded，过去分词为traded。 近义词有commerce（名词）、profession（名词）、employment（名词）等。

trade(贸易）--International Trade,中文为“国际贸易”，英文又称 “Foreign Trade”“External Trade”（对外贸易）。“国际贸易”(International Trade)这一说法着眼于“贸易是全球国家之间开展”；“对外贸易”(Foreign Trade或External Trade)着眼于开展贸易的一国。因此，“国际贸易”(International Trade)与“对外贸易”(Foreign Trade或External Trade)并无本质上的区别，只是着眼点不同而已。

yingyinNormal.en: The Silk Road was an ancient trade route linking China to the Mediterranean Sea.
yingyinNormal.zh: 丝绸之路是连接中国和地中海的一条古贸易通道。

yingyinNormal.en: But unfortunately it can take a long time for countries to trade their way to prosperity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但不幸的是，要靠贸易致富需要好一段时间。

yingyinNormal.en: Our nation was recovering from a political scandal and a trade crisis with China.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我国正在从一起政治丑闻和与中国的贸易危机中走出来。

yingyinNormal.en: This was no forsaken town on a lake. This was the center of all trade in the north!
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里不是被人遗忘的湖边小城，这里曾是北方的贸易中心。

yingyinNormal.en: Before the sun sets today, I will close down the Gobi trade routes starve Karakorum.
yingyinNormal.zh: 日落之前，我会关闭戈壁的贸易通道，哈拉和林会陷入饥荒。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the principle of comparative advantage and it has persuaded many countries to sign up to free-trade agreements.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就是比较优势原则，它也说服大家签订许多自由贸易协议。

yingyinNormal.en: It did not work, because at that time, people think, the trade affair and online are converse to each other.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但这也没有成功，因为当时人们觉得在线交易和贸易展会是互相冲突的。

yingyinNormal.en: However, economist David Ricardo showed that international trade could actually make everyone better off, bringing in one of the first great economic models.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而，经济学家戴维?李嘉图指出国际贸易时实际上能让大家都受益，带出早期伟大的经济理念之一。

yingyinNormal.en: Newcomers to New York spend much of their time looking skyward, but since the 2001 attacks on the World Trade Center, a new attraction gives locals and visitors a chance to pause and bow their heads.
yingyinNormal.zh: 刚到纽约的旅客都花很多时间抬头欣赏各座特色建筑物，但自 2001 年世界贸易中心受到恐怖袭击后，这里就有了一个新景点，当地人和旅客来到的时候都会停下来，低头凭吊一番。

yingyinNormal.en: Ooh, I think I wanna trade circles.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想和他交换生活圈。

yingyinNormal.en: All his wealth comes from trade with the Woodland realm.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他的收入全靠和林地王国的交易。

yingyinNormal.en: But at least part of Phillips' troublesome trade-off lives on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但至少这曲线的利弊影响还是持续着。

yingyinNormal.en: The rest are executed automatically by high-frequency trade algorithms.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其余的都是由高频交易算法自动执行。

yingyinNormal.en: Anybody wanna trade? Oh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有人要交换吗？

yingyinNormal.en: To be the first to trade with China, can you imagine it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 作第一个和中国做生意的人，您想象过吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, no. You didn't trade the food for magic beans, did you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是吧？你们不会用食物换了魔豆吧？

yingyinNormal.en: But I wouldn't trade this experience for a trip to the moon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但这份经历就算拿月球旅行我也不换。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't even know. It's Gally's recipe. It's a trade secret.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我也不知道，盖里的独家秘方，商业秘密。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, Chandler, come on. Okay. Joey, trade lives with me. Nope.
yingyinNormal.zh: 钱德，来啊。好。乔伊，跟我交换人生。不要。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm a quick study. Let me be clear. I intend to trade you ASAP.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我学得很快。我先说清楚，我会尽快把你交换出去。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 同业; 同行; 同人

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 贸易；交易；经商；交换

word_family.mean: n. 贸易；交易；生意；职业；行业；手艺；信风；贸易风；同业；同仁

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 工会主义者；工会会员；拥护工会制的人
贸易出版物；贸易刊物；贸易杂志

sense_info_list.en: the business of buying and selling items

examination_example.sentence: The US Federal <highlight>Trade</highlight> Commission says it wants to find the answer to that question.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国联邦贸易委员会表示，它希望找到这个问题的答案。

examination_example.sentence: CEOs must have a good sense of financial markets and maybe even how the company should <highlight>trade</highlight> in them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首席执行官们必须对金融市场有很好的判断力，甚至可能对公司应该如何在金融市场进行交易有很好的判断力。

examination_example.sentence: Retail <highlight>trade</highlight> groups praised the ruling, saying it levels the playing field for local and online businesses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 零售贸易组织对这一裁决表示赞赏，称它为本地和线上企业提供了公平的竞争环境。

sense_info_list.en: the business or work in which a person takes part regularly

examination_example.sentence: When the recovery began, worker shortages first appeared in the high-skilled <highlight>trades</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当经济开始复苏时，劳动力短缺首先出现在高技能行业。

sense_info_list.en: a particular area of business and the people or companies that are connected with it
sense_info_list.zh: 同业; 同行; 同人

examination_example.sentence_trans: 行业刊物咨询百货公司。

examination_example.sentence: Britain's Labor Party, as its name implies, has long been associated with <highlight>trade</highlight> unionism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国工党，顾名思义，长期以来一直与工会主义联系在一起。

examination_example.sentence: If the <highlight>trade</highlight> unionist Jimmy Hoffa were alive today, he would probably represent civil servants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果工会主义者吉米·霍法还健在，他将可能成为公务员的代表。

sense_info_list.en: a job, especially one that involves working with your hands and that requires special training and skills
to exist and operate as a business or company
the amount of goods or services that you sell
exchange something that you have for something that someone else has

word_usage.usage:
trade指“做买卖；做生意；从事贸易”时，可用作及物动词，接名词或代词作宾语。例：
Our products are now traded worldwide.
我们的产品现在销往世界各地。

trade指“做买卖；做生意；从事贸易”时，也可用作不及物动词；trade in sth. 进行……交易；trade with sb.与……进行交易。例：
They do a lively trade in souvenirs and gifts. 
他们做纪念品和礼品生意，做得有声有色。
Early explorers traded directly with the Indians.
早期的探险者与印第安人直接进行交易。
trade用作名词表示一般性非具体的“买卖；贸易；生意”时，是不可数名词，其前一般不加冠词。trade表示“具体的生意或行业”、“谋生手段；手艺；职业”等时，是可数名词。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“行当、行业、手艺”，尤指需要技术性劳动的工作。
意为“行业、（职业正规的）工作、（赖以为生的）正业”，尤指一个人特别适合或尤其有资格胜任的职业。
意为“生涯”，常指终身从事的工作或职业。
意为“职业、行业、专业”，正式用语，指受高等教育和特别训练的工作。
意为“工作、事儿”，可数名词。
意为“工作、事儿”，为不可数名词。
意为“职业、行业、专业”，正式用语。
意为“职业、岗位”，一般指某种特定工作。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 贸易；交易；生意；职业；行业；手艺；信风；贸易风；同业；同仁

sense_info_list.en: the business of buying and selling items
sense_info_list.zh: 贸易; 职业; 做买卖; 做生意

examination_example.sentence: The impact of <highlight>trade</highlight> on employment has been staggering.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 贸易对就业的影响令人震惊。

examination_example.sentence: The information is often not confidential, and the information is used as dirt against another manager, or can be <highlight>traded</highlight> among senior managers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种信息往往不是机密的，这些信息被用作针对另一位经理的污点，或者可以在高级经理之间交易。

examination_example.sentence: Many of us who aren't mathematicians at heart (or engineers by <highlight>trade</highlight>) may struggle to remember the last time we used calculus (微积分).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们当中的许多人如果不是数学家(或职业是工程师)可能很难记得上一次使用微积分是什么时候。

sense_info_list.en: the business or work in which a person takes part regularly

examination_example.sentence: Working for a new venture comes with a lot of risks—that is, instability, unclear responsibilities and the need to be a master of all <highlight>trades</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为一个新的企业工作伴随着很多风险——不稳定，责任不明确，需要精通所有的行业。

sense_info_list.en: exchange something that you have for something that someone else has
a job, especially one that involves working with your hands and that requires special training and skills
the amount of goods or services that you sell

word_usage.usage:
trade作名词泛指“买卖，贸易，生意”时，不可数，其前一般不加冠词。
develop trade 发展贸易
lose trade 失去生意

examination_example.sentence: More organizations (组织) have joined together to educate the local people that <highlight>trading</highlight> elephants is against the law.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 越来越多的组织联合起来，教育当地人买卖大象是违法的。

examination_example.sentence: However  from 2012 to 2016, poaching (偷猎) and illegal <highlight>trade</highlight> in the elephants increased rapidly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，从2012年到2016年，大象的偷猎和非法贸易迅速增长。

examination_example.sentence: In fact, many countries hope to build <highlight>trade</highlight> relations with China because of the"Belt and Road".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，因为“一带一路”，很多国家都希望与中国建立贸易关系。

普通用词，含义广。既可指某种具体的商业又可指广泛的贸易。
口语用词，指买卖双方经过交涉达成协议成交。
